thread.content:
Look up! A third 2018 watch for the day, let's see how The Rock dangles from this building

Follow us on the hashtag #getscraped25

#skysthelimit #skyanddry #watchhimdangle
Hello, I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on Skyscraper tonight. Let's get elevated! #getscraped25

Hi, I'm Hervey and I'll be commenting on this film today

I was curious about this back in 2018, and am looking forward to seeing the Rock dangle #getscraped25
Dreamy atmosphere in these opening credits #getscraped25
This film is Legendary! #getscraped25
Ray in Ash Lake, MN runs a hard bargain #getscraped25
Send in The Rock! #getscraped25
This is the coziest damn cabin, looks like damn lincoln logs #getscraped25
The Rock really messed that one up. #getscraped25
Damn! Rock's face got fucked up! #getscraped25
They should have taken dot Ray when they had 27 different laser pointers on his face #getscraped25
That is SUCH A GOOD SKYSCRAPER! #getscraped25
I love this skyscraper so much! This is so sick! #sickskyscraper #getscraped25
THE PEARL!!! #ilovethepearl #getscraped25
I need to know a LOT more about The Pearl. #getscraped25
I had no idea Neve Campbell was in this, or that Rock lost a leg to perform this role #getscraped25
Are they in The Pearl? I hope they're in The Pearl. #getscraped25
If I were flying The Rock out to interview for some sort of Pearl-related job, I'd put him up in The Pearl for sure #getscraped25
Everyone here looks like a real-life video game character. #getscraped25
Nighttime panda feeding!!! #getscraped25
Fuck yes! I'm going to be fucking pissed if anything goes wrong in this beautiful building #getscraped25
I like The Rock's shoulder bag. Very stylish but understated. #getscraped25
Great security lions #getscraped25
Dragons are a type of lion #getscraped25
One of these minions is definitely evil. #getscraped25

Everything is so stylish and slightly off in a wonderful way

This is very Cloud Atlas-core #getscraped25
Common rubes refer to the whole building as "The Pearl"; truly sophisticated people know that only the weird ball on top is The Pearl #thepearl #getscraped25
Why does The Sphere need to be so high in the sky? I hope there's a good lore reason for this. #getscraped25

My god, I loved that sequence so much

Just isolating The Rock and this businessguy in extremely unrealistic CG works so damn well #getscraped25
His bomb buddy clearly has a grievance and will clearly try to kill him #getscraped25
Now *this* is Hong Kong cinema. #HongKongCinema #getscraped25
Bag down #bagdown #getscraped25
Uh oh, The Pearl has structural issues. #getscraped25
We got spalling! #getscraped25
Big watch game all around. What are those, like 46mm? #getscraped25
The Rock knows how to take care of a tablet #getscraped25
We better get closure on the makeup nighttime panda feeding session #getscraped25
The Rock's family is the dearest thing in the world to him, and they're about to be in jeopardy. #getscraped25
"You should've just left it in the bag" #ClassicMovieLines #SkyscraperLines #getscraped25
Always good to have a fake leg to take the bullets. #getscraped25
Ben picked his friend The Rock because he knows The Rock gets his bags stolen all the time #getscraped25
Never get in a wrestling match with The Rock if you can avoid it. #getscraped25
I'm genuinely enjoying this a lot #getscraped25
An indoor fireworks show, a feast for the eyes #getscraped25
"We're perfectly safe here, I assure you" #getscraped25
The Pearl is looking quite safe, only the 96th floor is on fire #getscraped25
I really wish we could've spent more time in The Pearl before it caught on fire. Alas. #getscraped25
Tablet has been compromised, and virtual The Rock has been logged in, a true disaster #getscraped25
I'll be honest that I don't really understand why a company would give out a tablet that has security clearance for a new job applicant, of all people #getscraped25
Unclear why they couldn't use the tablet of the other guy they had already compromised? #getscraped25
I think the CEO/Pearl designer has enough sense to only trust The Rock, and not some damn skunks and finks #getscraped25
Kind of nuts this film is PG-13. We've seen like 40-50 people die in the past 5 minutes. #getscraped25
The Offsite Control Facility was the weak link all along! #getscraped25
This is the worst thing that can happen to your Offsite Security Panel #getscraped25
They're turning off the anti-fire measures and turning on the pro-fire measures #getscraped25
The assumption that the fire would stay constrained to the 96th floor is now in question #getscraped25
The crane is the key! #getscraped25
The logarithmic base cycle was the key #getscraped25
Beautiful bird! #getscraped25
The climb begins! #getscraped25
We're already delivering on most of the promises of the poster art #getscraped25
Aha! Now the highly regarded documentary Free Solo begins. #FreeSolo #getscraped25
Many consider this the most difficult part of the crane to climb #getscraped25
It was almost all over right there! Ready for the credits to roll at any point here. #getscraped25
Crane enabled #getscraped25
Game over for The Rock #getscraped25
The Rock's inability to speak Chinese is really hindering his progress here. #getscraped25
The common people support The Rock's goal to enter The Pearl, why can't the hifalutin law enforcement agencies show similar sense #getscraped25
Oh no, the clearly evil guy is evil! #getscraped25
Really enjoy spending this time in the atrium, even under these trying circumstances #getscraped25
I appreciate that the entire movie has a film grain effect applied to it. #getscraped25
I agree #testreply #getscraped25
Why is weird tweed man evil, he's so fucking offputting I thought he couldn't be simply evil #getscraped25
A novel solution to the problem of having a helicopter available. #getscraped25
The red thingy is safe! #getscraped25
Mr Pearl was a genius of security: he created at least one room that can't be unlocked remotely by the tablet he gave to a job applicant #getscraped25
"If you can't fix it with duct tape, then you're not using enough duct tape." #ClassicMovieLines #SkyscraperLines #RockLines #getscraped25
This movie is kinda fascinating, it's like Die Hard half-rewritten by unimaginative hacks, and half-rewritten by demented dreamers #getscraped25
Tweed man really played this poorly. He could've led with "come with me, you'll be safe" instead of pulling a gun on them. They don't know he's evil. #getscraped25
Tweed man has been casually knocked into the fire! #getscraped25
This movie is a platformer #getscraped25
What is this, The Super Mario Bros. Movie? #getscraped25
Great job saving the son, just have to cut your losses and forget about the daughter though #getscraped25
"In order to be brave, we've gotta be a little scared." #ClassicMovieLines #RockLines #SkyscraperLines #getscraped25
There's a time in every father's life when he has to let his kids know that free-falling down an elevator shaft is totally normal #getscraped25
Someone's about to get steam-vented. #getscraped25
Confirmed steam venting. #getscraped25
These two goons look like Randall "Tex" Cobb and Paul Reubens #getscraped25
The fact the building has its own wind generator is a good way to explain why all the power is still on. #getscraped25
Game over for The Rock. #getscraped25
Clueless white woman responds in perfect chinese, shocks police #getscraped25
Just searching some parachutes on Baidu. #getscraped25
This has become a film about where to drop in Fortnite: Hong Kong. #getscraped25
I love how they're trying to get away by talking cantonese behind her back, just minutes after they know she can speak it #getscraped25
Wind turbine lookin real slicey here. #getscraped25
This is the 5th scene in the movie that feels like a Mario 64 level #getscraped25
This is basically the "chompers" scene from Galaxy Quest, but played seriously. #getscraped25
The Rock is dangling #wow #getscraped25
Very nice large Sharp brand television in the town square. #getscraped25
Hiding tracking software inside a wire transfer is very clever! #getscraped25
People are calling it "the worst wire transfer of all time" #getscraped25
This is some really unnecessarily convoluted setup, but I'll accept it. #getscraped25
I'll accept it, and also relish it #getscraped25
If I were in this situation, I'd make a bunch of replica red gizmos #bunchagizmos #getscraped25
PEARL TIME, BABY #getscraped25
Show the Pearl in Act 1, use the Pearl in Act 3. #getscraped25
I knew this businessman was a genius to build an orb which is also a mirror labyrinth #getscraped25
The tablet! #getscraped25

Wow, Kores has a grenade *and* a hole in the ground

One is manageable, but you just gotta surrender when he has both #getscraped25
"I'm behind you." YESSSSSSSS #getscraped25
So fucking stupid (but it mostly works) #getscraped25
Building looking good atm. #getscraped25
The Pearl was built to withstand minor mishaps like this, it will be back to normal within 2-3 weeks #getscraped25
Reboot the building! #RebootTheBuilding #getscraped25
This is such a smart movie, and taught people the importance of power cycling #getscraped25
I really hope this film ends with a nice, cleaned-up The Pearl and people spending lots of time having fun in it for another 20 minutes or so. #getscraped25
We deserve it #getscraped25
The Rock's got a big scorched head #getscraped25
Playing some Burnin' Tower Blues #getscraped25

Really sucks that the whole movie is stopping the building from being on fire, and now we have to see the building on fire again during these closing credits

#makeitmakesense #getscraped25
That was entertaining, but I wanted a lot more of a functional The Pearl and a lot less of an on-fire The Pearl. I think this will be hard to dig too much into as an Earful film. #getscraped25

I frankly had a great time with this, but it is a *very* stupid action movie that has a bunch of big sloppy sequences that don't mean much and the details are kinda fake

But it's dense and antic, I wouldn't be heartbroken to cover via earful #getscraped25
